comment.author: 70889503@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Historical Gardens, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 45621760@N00
comment._content: The fountain and the park is still there today. It's a beautiful park, that is being restored right now. The building in this photo was a restaurant built in 1881. It was destroyed in a fire and replaced by a new (now excisting) building in 1912.
